condition: I can’t seem to distract my child when they are misbehaving.
condition_name: I can’t seem to distract my child wh
message_text: Sorry to hear that you are finding this difficult. Next time try to catch the misbehaviour early on, before it sets in or escalates. You can do this!

condition: I am too angry to find anything positive to say to my child after they have misbehaved.
condition_name: I am too angry to find anything posi
message_text: Sorry to hear that you are finding this difficult. Next time, take a deep breath, take some space, and then pick something very small and concrete that you wish your child could do more of that you can praise in your child. You can do this!

condition: My child is misbehaving all the time.
condition_name: My child is misbehaving all the time
message_text: @fields.child_nickname

Sorry to hear that you are finding this difficult. You may need to spend more One-on-One Time with @fields.child_nickname and give more positive attention to them when they are behaving well. This takes time so be patient!

message_text: @fields.child_nickname
@fields.child_nickname

That's okay! The more you pay attention to what @fields.child_nickname is doing, the easier it will be to catch the bad behaviour before it gets worse and redirect it to a positive behaviour. If you find that you are too busy or not around @fields.child_nickname, you can also teach this skill to other caregivers in your family. It's a group effort!
